Title: Part 1 -- Design Your Product
Description:
As a designer, your goal is to design an affordable video streaming product that fits the budget and needs of the buyer we matched for you (BuyerID: B556093). Based on our market research, many customers stated their need to understand weather forecast videos in cars.

To help your design process, we have broken down your task into two steps.

On this page, you will choose between the two qualities of each element for your design of the video streaming service. The video will change below as you select the different qualities.

On the next page, you will price each of these componenets after you have submitted your design.

Remember, the buyer wants to understand the content of the weather forecast video. To help you with your design, our quality assurance team designed three questions the buyer will answer after watching the video via your design. The questions are:


(1) Which region will have the highest severe threat?
(2) What will be the temperature in Caribou?
(3) What will be the temperature in Pierre?

Click "Submit" after you have finished your design.
